post.text:

comment.author: Adam
comment.text: Ok with unborn child being murdered just because inside the mothers body? A baby is a human being and needs protection against legalized murder. Innocent blood!!!

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: God will be their final judge and we all will give account of every idle word and deed to The One who makes final decisions.
